author: Hawkblogger
title: Cooper Kupp Makes Big First Impression
text:
Cooper Kupp Makes Big First Impression
HB MORNINGS EP 359 The Seahawks introduced their new WR, Cooper Kupp, at a press conference, and the former Super Bowl MVP did not disappoint. There could not have been a better way for him to start his tenure in a Seahawks uniform. I discuss what Mike Macdonald and John Schneider are building based on who they are bringing in. 00:00 Intro 00:46 Episode 365 Incoming! 04:25 Reminder: New Benefit For YouTube Club+ Members! 06:35 Seahawks News 12:34 Cooper Kupp Insights 42:40 New DK Metcalf News 46:58 Q & A Be sure to like and subscribe! Sign up for exclusive...
